import './admin-update-company.css' import history from '../../../../../../history' import { Formik, Form, Field } from 'formik' export default function AdminUpdateCompany() { const closeDiv = () => { if (window.confirm('Are you sure you want to close this window?')) history.push('/admin/companies') } const initialPassword = '' const handleSubmit = (values) => { let sentPassword = values.password if (sentPassword === '') { //don't send "values.password", send "sentPassword" sentPassword = initialPassword; } console.log(values)//TODO delete history.push('/admin/companies') alert('success') } return ( <>
Update An Existing Company
{({ values }) => (
{/* ------------------------------From:------------------------------ */} {/* ------------------------------To:------------------------------ */}
From: To:
Name
Email
Password
)}
) }
